/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is framed by towering buildings on either side, their glass and concrete facades reflecting the overcast sky. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and brown, typical of a cityscape, with occasional splashes of green from the trees lining the street providing a touch of nature amidst the concrete jungle.
